lead_paragraph: In an interview Monday with The Associated Press, Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton said she has "tried to not only take responsibility, because it was my decision, but to be as transparent as possible" about her use of a private email server when she was secretary of state.

headline.main: Highlights From AP's Interview With Hillary Rodham Clinton
headline.print_headline: Highlights From AP's Interview With Hillary Rodham Clinton
